name: Keiji Shinogi
quote: It's just intuition. I'm confident in my eye for people.

name: Kanna Kizuchi
quote: There won't be a way... unless we believe!

name: Q-taro Burgerberg
quote: Straight to the point: I got experience handlin' guns.

name: Sou Hiyori
quote: S-sorry! If you can't trust me... that's fine...

name: Reko Yabusame
quote: It's what we do now that's important, right?

name: Gin Ibushi
quote: I can read the room too, meow!

name: Kazumi Mishima
quote: I wasn't suited for living. But in truth... I wanted to live

name: Ranmaru Kageyama
quote: That just makes us... his puppets...

name: Hinako Mishuku
quote: Are you stupid?! Why would you go easy on her...?!

name: Naomichi Kurumada
quote: A weakling's fate... is mine to decide.

name: Shunsuke Hayasaka
quote: Just think about it... I'm not the real Hayasaka.

name: Midori
quote: Since he was going to die anyway, I wanted to kill him with my own hands...
